title: About Me
text:
I’m a senior at UCLA, studying Statistics and Data Science. I currently work within the consulting industry as a Data & AI analyst.
My interests include:

Data analytics & visualization

Machine learning & AI

Statistical modeling
Product & Strategy

title: Projects & Research
text:
Built a platform for UCLA students to purchase and sell items.
Repo: https://github.com/ythou00/BruinMart_Official




Analyzed happiness scores across countries using the World Happiness Report to investigate what factors are strong predictors of a country’s happiness scores, and how can these insights inform global policy-making.
Website: https://dhhappiness2024.humspace.ucla.edu/




Developed classification models to predict credit scores in Python.
Repo: https://github.com/hyu4/Credit-Score-Classification

title: Projects & Research
text: Exploring the intersection of deep learning and musicality to create generative models that capture emotion without plagiarizing existing works.

title: Projects & Research
text:
A modeling project using time-series regression to forecast residential construction costs for the Mid-Atlantic and Southeast regions.

Built with: Python, scikit-learn, Prophet

Features: Interactive dashboard, cashflow forecasting

Repo: https://github.com/YOUR-REPO

title: Projects & Research
text: Designed a modern messaging interface in React with a dark yellow/black theme for UCLA’s student marketplace platform.
